posts.post_content:
Posted By: joe
Fred, I know you are still looking for N172 Old Judge cards. I know you are not having good luck.

All Detroit Players. I still need Baldwin, Watkins and White.   



I also need Conway, Gilligan, McGlone, Rooks, 



Scheibeck and Wheelock. 











Joe:)



 











Ty Cobb, Spikes flying!
